title: Fairfield police investigating teen's homicide
content:
FAIRFIELD, AL (WBRC) -
Fairfield police are investigating a homicide that happened on Sunday, June 19.
The Jefferson County Coroner confirmed Arrico Eatmon, 17, was shot around 5:25 p.m. in the 5500 block of Avenue D. He was transported to UAB Hospital and pronounced dead.
No one has been arrested so far. Fairfield police are expected to release more information later Monday or on Tuesday.
Check back with this story for updates.
